summary: User requests separating the Temporal PHP SDK client into a standalone package that doesn't require RoadRunner as a dependency, as they only need the client functionality without worker capabilities.
userImpact: Users who only need the Temporal client are forced to install RoadRunner even though they don't use worker functionality.
proposedFix: Separate the client code into a standalone package with optional RoadRunner dependency.
workaround: The maintainer noted that RoadRunner doesn't need to be installed if only using the Client part.
resolutionDetails: Maintainer clarified that RoadRunner is not required if only using the Client - users can simply not install it.
keyQuote: Just don't install RoadRunner. You don't have to install RoadRunner if you just use Client part.
